headline: Linde (LIN) Isn’t Seeing US Reshoring, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 12 Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. Linde plc (NASDAQ:LIN) is one of the stocks aon Jim Cramer’s radar. Linde plc (NASDAQ:LIN) is one of the largest industrial gas companies in the world. The firm has struggled recently, primarily due to weakness in the European economy. These struggles were evident in Linde plc […]
